title.rendered: Located in the Heart of the <?php echo $row['country']; ?> Building Boom

content.rendered:
Seeing a lot of construction around these days? You’re not the only one.

Both commercially and residentially, building is booming these days – just check out our infographic below showing some of the neighborhoods experiencing the most growth.

And that white building right in the center of it all? That’s us over here at – your building supply resource right in the heart of downtown .

Our location demonstrates our love for this city. Let us provide you with the materials to ensure that Beantown stays a Boom Town for a long time.
